title: SFEC Form 3630 - Recipients of Major Behested Payments - Filings
description:
Under San Francisco Campaign & Governmental Conduct Code Section 3.630(a)(1), any person who receives a behested payment, or series of behested payments in a calendar year, totaling $100,000 or more must file this form within 30 days following the date on which the payments total $100,000 or more. For example, if your behested payments received total $100,000 on June 12, 2019, you must submit this form by July 12, 2019. You must notify the Ethics Commission that the recipient has received such payment(s) and specify the date on which the payment(s) equaled or exceeded $100,000. 

Additionally, under San Francisco Campaign & Governmental Conduct Code Section 3.630(a)(2), if you filed this report to notify the Ethics Commission that you received behested payments totaling $100,000 or more, you must file this form again between 12 and 13 months following the date on which the payment(s) or payments total $100,000 or more and submit Schedule A. For example, if your behested payments total $100,000 on June 12, 2019, you must submit Schedule A between June 12, 2020 and July 12, 2020.  Filers must disclose all payments made that were funded in whole or in part by the behested payment(s) made at the behest of the City officer and if the person was an interested party in any City decision(s) involving the officer in the 12 months following the date on which the payment(s) were made.

Activity reported on Schedule A1 - Expenditures Report and Schedule A2 - Proceeding(s) Disclosure are available in separate datasets, linked from the dataset primer.

columns.name: DocuSign ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the filing, generated automatically by DocuSign

columns.name: Filing Type
columns.description: Is the Filing Original, Amendment, or Supplemental? An Amendment supersedes the Original filing; a Supplemental is a continuation of a filing, indicating more fields were required

columns.name: Filing
columns.description: URL to download PDF copy of the filing

columns.name: Original Filing Date
columns.description: Only used if the Filing Type is Amendment, indicating the date of the Original Filing

columns.name: Amendment Description
columns.description: Explanation for Amendment, provided by filer

columns.name: Date Signed
columns.description: Date form was signed and submitted to the Ethics Commission

columns.name: Signer Name
columns.description: Name of person who signed the filing

columns.name: Purpose Type
columns.description: Purpose of the filing: 30 Day Report or 12 Month Report

columns.name: Recipient Name
columns.description: Name of recipient of major behested payment(s)

columns.name: Recipient Street
columns.description: Street address of recipient of major behested payment(s)

columns.name: Recipient City
columns.description: City of recipient of major behested payment(s)

columns.name: Recipient State
columns.description: State of recipient of major behested payment(s)

columns.name: Recipient Zip
columns.description: Zip code of recipient of major behested payment(s)

columns.name: Representative Name
columns.description: Name of authorized representative if recipient is not a person

columns.name: Representative Title
columns.description: Title of authorized representative if recipient is not a person

columns.name: Representative Telephone
columns.description: Telephone number of authorized representative if recipient is not a person

columns.name: Representative Email
columns.description: Email address of authorized representative if recipient is not a person

columns.name: City Officer Name
columns.description: Name of city officer who behested payment(s)

columns.name: City Officer Title
columns.description: Title of city officer who behested payment(s)

columns.name: Behested Payment Total
columns.description: Total amount of payment(s)

columns.name: Behested Payment Date
columns.description: Date payment(s) equaled or exceeded $100,000

columns.name: Additional Expenditures Checkbox
columns.description: Checkbox to indicate if the filer needed to file additional expenditures.  Additional expenditures are filed on a subsequent filing with filing type of "Supplemental".

columns.name: Interested Party Decision Officer Checkbox
columns.description: Checkbox to indicate if the filer needed to filing disclosures of proceedings.  If so, data will be available in the proceedings dataset.

columns.name: Additional Proceedings Checkbox
columns.description: Checkbox to indicate if the filer needed to file additional proceedings.  Additional expenditures are filed on a subsequent filing with filing type of "Supplemental".

columns.name: Expenditures SubTable Query
columns.description: URL to query DocuSign ID of filing on expenditures dataset

columns.name: Proceedings SubTable Query
columns.description: URL to query DocuSign ID of filing on proceedings dataset
